summary: Water quality is stable but pH is slightly below optimal range for tilapia.

insights.recommendation: Consider adjusting pH to maintain between 7.2 and 7.6 for optimal tilapia health.
Monitor TDS levels; current levels are acceptable for both fish and plants.
Maintain water temperature between 24°C and 30°C for optimal growth.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.042 / 7.016 / 7.088 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 311.76 / 295.1 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 27.473 / 24.19 / 30.44 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
